lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say Bill Baroni, a former aide to Gov. Chris Christie, and a colleague gleefully plotted together as closely as the two villainous traders in “Trading Places,” one of their favorite films.

headline.print_headline: In Bridge Trial, Prosecutors Liken Ex-Christie Allies to Film Villains
headline.main: In Bridge Scandal Trial, Prosecutors Liken Ex-Christie Allies to Film Villains

snippet: Prosecutors say Bill Baroni, a former aide to Gov. Chris Christie, and a colleague gleefully plotted together as closely as the two villainous traders in “Trading Places,” one of their favorite films....
abstract: Prosecutors refute testimony by Bill Baroni, former aide to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, in which he claimed he was unaware of scheme surrounding lane closings on George Washington Bridge and was duped by Port Authority official David Wildstein, likening ex-allies to villains from film Trading Places.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
